rules_text:
Fortified lands you control have “{T}: Add {R}{R}. Spend this mana only to cast Goblin spells or activate abilities of Goblins.”
{2}{R}, Sacrifice fortified land: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
Fortify {1} [i]({1}: Attach to target land you control. Fortify only as a sorcery.)[/i]
